metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42717 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Hashicorp Packer before 2.3.1. The recommendedsudoers configuration for Vagrant on Linux is insecure. If the host hasbeen configured according to this documentation, non-privileged users onthe host can leverage a wildcard in the sudoers configuration to executearbitrary commands as root.

criterions.comment: vagrant package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
